subject: extending home loans hassle free
body:
Loan approval department is trying to contact you
 You have been pre-qualified for a one-time program that will save you up to 35pct. off your current payment.
 You could get up to $299,000 for as low as never.
 Follow our link to complete your application
 http://www.abcofkingnet.com/
 We need to hear back from you as soon as possible
 Regards,
 LendersTeam.
